Travelers

No cash to tip service staff? TipYo is a secure mobile tipping App that allows you to tip service staff from your phone at participating locations.

Download the app today!

How it Works

We partner with hotels, parking garages and restaurants to provide travelers convenience and service staff a way to receive your recognition via electronic tips. 100% of your tip goes to staff and there is no cost to you.

Your Phone

You send a tip via the TipYo App

Property

Property processes tips in payroll

Service Staff

Staff receives tip in their paycheck

Use Your Phone to Securely Tip

Step 1

Open the TipYo App

Step 2

Select or customize your tip amount

Step 3

Select participating location

Step 4

Choose staff to tip

Step 5

Enter your room number or staff person's name

Step 6

Chose payment method and confirm tip

Have general questions?

Email us at support@tipyo.net (you'll hear back within 24 hours)
